prompt: Design a 404 Not Found page with a dark purple background (Colors.purple[900]). Feature '404' in bold white (Colors.white, font size 76). Display 'Lost Somewhere?' in light purple (Colors.purple[200], font size 28, semi-bold). Include a message 'The page you’re looking for can’t be found.' in white (Colors.white70, font size 16). Add a purple 'Return Home' button with rounded corners (borderRadius: 12) and white text. Use a Stack layout to place a small star icon (Icons.star, size 40, Colors.purple[200]) to the right of the '404' text. Center the main content in a Column with mainAxisAlignment.center and crossAxisAlignment.center. Apply padding of 24.0 on all sides. Use a Scaffold with the dark purple background.
